about_the_game:
Imagine if there was a place,
a pandemonium of walls, towers and dungeons,
and now suppose, here, in these dark halls, you were left for dead,
subjected to the wrath of countless sinners from an ancient world. . .

But you don’t belong here yet. . .
So escape!
Before even your soul is consumed
by the Labyrinth. . .

A challenging Dante-inspired horror adventure including, obscure puzzles, vile creatures, blood-curdling combat, devious traps and a dark and terrible lore.
A game about escaping a heinous and unholy place.

SOLVE PUZZLES




The Labyrinth is filled with countless puzzles and mysteries for you to uncover. Which treasures lie waiting for you. . .
And what secrets may be best left unsolved?

DEFEAT DESPICABLE CREATURES




Terrifying enemies lie waiting behind every corner.
Be ready to defend your life in a moments notice or face running blind in the dark.

REVEAL ITS SINISTER PAST




Uncover the past of the Labyrinth by exploring and finding key locations and items.
Track your progress in an immersive notebook and put your investigative skill to the test.

Features:
- A First-Person narrative horror game
- Explore and uncover the long-lost past
- Solve puzzles and discover what secrets lie beyond them
- Fight the corrupted souls of The Labyrinth

name: Labyrinth: Immortal Oblivion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 8-core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Labyrinth: Immortal Oblivion is a singleplayer, story-driven, dante inspired, horror adventure. You'll explore a 3D Horror Maze where you'll solve puzzles and fight powerful monsters to uncover its sinister past. Escape before you too are consumed by this twisted place...
